3.0.0.en: Migrated to Homey SDK 3. Fixed multi-floor device search. Fixed AC fan & dry modes. Fixed AC horizontal vane control. Fixed various bugs.

3.0.4.en: Filter devices according type when adding ones.

3.0.6.en: Fixed heat pump control: you may need to add your devices again and restart Homey.

3.1.0.en: Add logs and fix/improve flow cards. Some capabilities or settings have been moved to benefit from the best Homey features.

3.1.1.en: Add logs and fix/improve flow cards. Some capabilities or settings have been moved to benefit from the best Homey features.
